00182 inline int ChannelData::TimeToSample(double time, bool checkrange)
00183 { 
00184   int samp = (int)(time*sample_rate + trigger_index);
00185   if(checkrange){
00186     if(samp < 0) samp = 0;
00187     if(samp > nsamps-1) samp = nsamps-1;
00188   }
00189   return samp;
00190 }
